name: Pong Runner
description:
C++ Programming - Robert Glen

Runner item spawning programming - David Cowley

Art and animation - Vasileios Tsagkaropoulos

Art - Scott Brown, Darren Penfold

A game made for Solent Games department's Video Games Academy. Play pong until defeated, then play a runner game! Made in Unreal Engine 4 (C++ only - no blueprints).
